author: JHiltbrand
body:
#### PR description:

This PR makes a small adjustment to the `AlCaHcalIsotrkProducer` and adds an associated configuration to point said producer to HLT object collections. This is in anticipation of running the `HcalCalIsoTrackProducerFilter` ALCARECO on a new dedicated AlCaRaw data stream: `AlCaHcalIsoTrk`, which will be fed by an updated `HLT_IsoTrackHBHE_v` path.

Additional background information related to updating the `HLT_IsoTrackHB/HE_v` path(s): [CMSHLT-3519](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3519), [CMSHLT-3517](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3517)

ATTN: @leyva-daina, @perrotta, @bsunanda

title: Add Config for Running HcalCalIsoTrkProducerFilter ALCARECO on new AlCaHcalIsoTrk AlCaRaw Stream
